author: Reuters Editorial
title: Australia's Reliance Worldwide buys UK's John Guest for $922.9 mln -statement
text:
May 24 (Reuters) - Reliance Worldwide Corp Ltd is buying the U.K.’s John Guest Holdings Ltd for A$1.22 billion ($922.93 million), the Australian plumbing fittings maker said on Thursday.
Reliance said in a statement that the purchase price would be supported by raising equity of up to A$1.10 billion.
U.K.-headquartered John Guest is a maker of plastic “push-to-connect” (PTC) fittings.
$1 = 1.3219 Australian dollars Reporting by Aaron Saldanha in Bengaluru
